MemAddress  Encoding	Lines_Code

0000000000	        	mini:
0000000000	0x00040000	ldc array 
0000000001	0x00040A00	ldc num2  
0000000002	0x00000004	ldnl 0    
0000000003	0x00001B10	brlz done 
0000000004	0x00000006	add       
0000000005	0x00000004	ldnl 0    
0000000006	0x00000003	stl 0     
0000000007	0x00040B00	ldc mexi  
0000000008	0x00000004	ldnl 0    
0000000009	0x00000002	ldl 0     
0000000010	0x00000007	sub    
0000000011	0x00000610	brlz update
0000000012	0x00040A00	ldc num2  
0000000013	0x00000004	ldnl 0
0000000014	0xFFFFFF01	adc -1
0000000015	0x00040A00	ldc num2
0000000016	0x00000005	stnl 0
0000000017	0xFFFFEE11	br mini  
0000000018	0x00040000	update:ldc array
0000000019	0x00040A00	ldc num2
0000000020	0x00000004	ldnl 0
0000000021	0x00000006	add   
0000000022	0x00000004	ldnl 0
0000000023	0x00040B00	ldc mexi
0000000024	0x00000005	stnl 0   
0000000025	0x00040A00	ldc num2   
0000000026	0x00000004	ldnl 0
0000000027	0xFFFFFF01	adc -1
0000000028	0x00040A00	ldc num2
0000000029	0x00000005	stnl 0
0000000030	0xFFFFE111	br mini  
0000000031	0x00000012	done:HALT
0000001024	0x0000005A	array: data    90
0000001025	0x0000000A	data    10
0000001026	0xFFFFFFEC	data    -20
0000001027	0x00000014	data   20
0000001028	0x00000064	data   100
0000001029	0x00000003	data    3
0000001030	0xFFFFFFE8	data    -24

0000001032	0x0000000C	data    12
0000001033	0x00000005	data    5
0000001034	0x00000009	num2: data 9
